hero.name: Squirrel Girl
hero.specialAbility: GO NUTS!At the start of your turn, summon a squirrel in a space adjacent to Squirrel Girl.Squirrels are small fighters. Do not start with any squirrels on the board.

cards.title: Bite of Steel
cards.duringText: If there are four or more squirrels in the opposing fighter's zone, the value of this card is 5 instead.

cards.title: Call of the Mild
cards.basicText: After combat: If you won the combat, draw 2 cards.
cards.duringText: If there are four or more squirrels in your fighter's zone, the value of this card is 4 instead

cards.title: Eat Nuts
cards.basicText: Squirrel Girl recovers 2 health. Summon a squirrel in a space adjacent to Squirrel Girl.

cards.title: Fuzzball Special
cards.basicText: After combat: Move each squirrel up to 3 spaces.

cards.title: Get 'Em Tippy-Toe!
cards.basicText: After combat: Summon two squirrels in any space.

cards.title: Horde of Squirrels
cards.basicText: Choose a space with four or more squirrels adjacent to it. Deal 2 damage to a fighter in that space.

cards.title: Kick Butts
cards.duringText: Increase the value of this card by +1 for each squirrel adjacent to the opposing fighter.

cards.title: Nutwork of Spies
cards.basicText: Look at an opponent's hand and choose 1 card for them to discard. If one of their fighters is adjacent to four or more squirrels, choose 2 cards instead.

cards.title: Squirgility
cards.basicText: After combat: Move Squirrel Girl up to 3 spaces. She may move through sidekicks. Do not count movement for spaces containing sidekicks.

cards.title: Unbeatable Squirrel Girl
cards.immediateText: If there are four or more squirrels adjacent to the opposing fighter, cancel all effects on your opponent's card and ignore its value.

cards.title: Squirmish
cards.basicText: After combat: Summon a squirrel in Squirrel Girl's space. Then, you place Squirrel Girl in any space in her zone.

cards.title: Feint
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

cards.title: Dash
cards.basicText: After combat: Move your fighter up to 3 spaces.
